actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.

official_title: A bill to amend the Budgeting and Accounting Act, 1921, to affirm the authority of the Comptroller General to have access to any books, documents, papers, or records of any Federal department or establishment for managerial and operational as well as for fiscal reviews and evaluations.

summary.text: Amends the Budgeting and Accounting Act of 1921 to give the Comptroller General access to any books, documents, papers, or records of any Federal agency.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Budgeting and Accounting Act, 1921, to affirm the authority of the Comptroller General to have access to any books, documents, papers, or records of any Federal department or establishment for managerial and operational as well as for fiscal reviews and evaluations.
